import React from 'react'; import { FaInstagramSquare, FaLinkedin, FaFacebookSquare, } from "react-icons/fa"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; const About = () => { const team = [ { name: "Ashish Soni", src: require("https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/mysterious-mafia-man-smoking-cigarette_7074311.htm#query=avatar%20logo&position=0&from_view=keyword&track=ais"), desc: "MERN full Stack Developer", }, { name: "Ayush Dubey", src: require("https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/mysterious-gangster-character_7275333.htm#query=avatar%20logo&position=4&from_view=keyword&track=ais"), desc: "MERN full Stack Developer", }, { name: "Aman Gupta", src: require("./images/Aman.png"), desc: "Team Leader", }, { name: "Arpit Tiwari", src: require("https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/mysterious-gangster-character_7275333.htm#query=avatar%20logo&position=4&from_view=keyword&track=ais"), desc: "Content Writer", }, { name: "Anurag Yadav", src: "https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/men/1.jpg", desc: "Content Writer", }, ]; return ( <>

Our Purpose

Our purpose is to bring all the NGOs on single platform to enhance communication between the NGO and the doner. there are many people living in scarcity of resources food, clothes, books, electronics etc. so, it is an approach with socialistic ideals to help who are needy by those who have resources in excess. In our households we have multiple items and gadgets which is of no use for us neither has good resale value like old used smartphone, or Telivision because you have shifted to LED or Smart TV. But these could be useful for others who are rebuilding thier home after any environmental disaster.

Our Team

{team.map((member, index) => (

{member.name}

{member.desc}

))}
) } export default About
